rules.label: CSCI OPTIONS/CAPSTONE
Computer Science Options: Vision, Graphics, Robotics & Games/Capstone

rules.extra_text: Students are required to take 4 CS option courses.  To fulfill the capstone requirement in CSCI, students need to either take 3 of these CS options in the same concentration area (from one below) OR complete a 4-credit URP. The URP must be a research-focused capstone supervised by a CSCI or CSCI-affiliated faculty member.  Students must complete a formal, written research project or paper approved by the faculty supervisor.
